title: Bug 112458 - Property Editor shows properties of layout items when switching to Master page viewer
description: The Property Editor is incorrectly showing the properties of layout items when switching to the Master page viewer.
OB: When switching to the Master page viewer, the Property Editor continues to display the properties of layout items instead of showing the properties of the Master page.
EB: The Property Editor should only show the properties of the Master page when in the Master page viewer.
SR:
To reproduce:

1. Create a new report.
2. Insert a label.
3. Select the label.

Expected: The Property Editor should show the label's properties.

Actual: Instead of showing the label's properties, the Property Editor still displays the properties of layout items.
